title: Americans DON’T Hate Asians | Guests: Russell Vought & J.J. Koch | 3/18/21
description:
The Left is using a murder spree in Georgia to push the narrative of an anti-Asian hate crime crisis, but Glenn has his doubts. Due to the border crisis, thousands of migrant teenage boys will be moved to a convention center in Dallas, but nobody can give a straight answer about how this decision was made. Small business owner and Polish immigrant Marlena Pavlos-Hackney is facing arrest for violating the coronavirus restrictions, and she joins Glenn to explain why she’s not backing down. Dallas County District 2 Commissioner J.J. Koch joins to share shocking updates on the Dallas migrant controversy. Former Trump OMB Director Russell Vought joins to critique the Biden administration’s handling of the border crisis.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
